name: Ha Van Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room and service were excellent. Unfortunately, we had a bracelet stolen coming back to the hotel one night and had to report it to the police. The manager (Mr Ha?)came to the police station and was very helpful indeed. A great value hotel.
reviews.title: Great value, lovely, helpful people. Loved the roof top bar.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed one night in the Ha Van Hotel, and we liked it very much.
reviews.title: Great Place

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The location is good: on the border of the busy tourist district (with the Sinh Cafe), and a 5 minutes walk from the beach.
reviews.title: shop around,you may be surprised

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The lobby was big and great (and NOT filled with motorcycles and cars at night ;-) ), and you could get breakfast in the morning (not included), and drinks all day (not included).
reviews.title: Fantastic stay, clean rooms, great staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Friendly staff and very very friendly Nicolas.
reviews.title: Excellent Hotel / Location / Staff. Coldest beer in Vietnam.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Ha Van has a great location only a few steps from lots of restaurants and a short walk to the beach.
reviews.title: Great value hotel with lovely rooms

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2009, traveled solo
reviews.text: The rooms were lovely & bright with comfy chairs & strong wi-fi connection. The front balcony room on the 1st floor had lots of traffic noise early in the morning so we changed to a quiet room at the side (without any hassle) & we really enjoyed our stay.
reviews.title: Great little place.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff were friendly, the aircon was powerful & this was a good value room for only $18.
reviews.title: Lovely service - excellent hotel for the price

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I stayed in Nha Trang for about 4 days and enjoyed myself greatly. Ha Van is really a wonderful place to stay for the price. It is located maybe a 5-7min walk away from the beach (and Sailing Club). The rooms are large with nice balcony for around $22/night.
reviews.title: Great Hotel - go there!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff at the hotel are great. I booked the hotel through email and Nicolas was extremely helpful before I arrived and confirmed the booking a few days before I got into Nha Trang. Nicolas and his wife were extremely nice when I was there and have incredible plans for making the hotel an even nicer place. Their kids are adorable. I can online imagine this place will get better and better as time goes on.
reviews.title: Superb hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Like nearly every other review I have to have to start with the management.
reviews.title: Very comfortable stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled with family
reviews.text: Nicolas and his wife maintain a tightly run establishment. It is their passion that makes this as good as it is. We booked directly and received quick informative and accurate responses on email.
reviews.title: A great budget hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room was pleasant but not the wonderful boutique look that you often get in Vietnam, wood panneling, petals on pillows , nice towels etc. It was functional really including the bathroom, and had a balcony, but the view isn´t all that great.
reviews.title: Money was stolen - but got it back from the manager

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled with family
reviews.text: Room had a TV with Cable TV, came in very handy when we got sunburnt and didn´t want to venture outside. The hotel is easily close enough to the action but some other places (no doubt more expensive) have nice sea views.
reviews.title: Excellent Everything written is true

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I didn´t visit the roof top bar, I can´t remember even being told about it - shame. Internet was available on the "staff PC" but it would have been nice to have a dedicated PC for guests.
reviews.title: Amazing Stay at Ha Van Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2009, traveled with family
reviews.text: My Father, Brother and I stayed at the Flamingo (Ha Van) in April 2009. I contacted the manager, Nicolas, via email and made arrangements for our stay. Nicolas was very accommodating both during the booking process and upon our arrival. He allowed us look at several different room configurations before we chose our room. We decide on the triple which was nice and roomy. Although it had no view it was comfortable for three men. The room was very clean and the service was great. Check out the rooftop bar for a great view while having a beer and cigar. In reading some of the reviews of this hotel I couldn't understand why some folks were being so critical. For the price, this was one of the better hotels we stayed in while in Vietnam. Staff were trust worthy and Nicolas knows how to run a reputable hotel. I'd definitely recommend this hotel to a friend.
reviews.title: Great Hotel, Staff and Location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2009, traveled with friends
reviews.text: HAVAN'S HOTEL IS GREAT.This was THE BEST PLACE to stay - Max and I had fabulous service from all the staff, comfortable beds, and easy go to the beach,near disco,restaurant,market...everything u want..We stayed for a week and enjoyed every moment..Thx for the great time in Havan's hotel and the beach NhaTrang!Nha Trang is BEAUTIFUL and we had GOOD FRIENDS in there!!!
reviews.title: HAVAN'S HOTEL IS GREAT.This was THE BEST PLACE to stay!!! I choice Havan's hotel in NhaTrang

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2009, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Sure this is the best price/quality Hotel of Nha Trang because of its wonderful service. The manager and his spouse speak English, viet and French, which help to know the best restaurants and bars to go, but also best place to go in Motobike they rent very cheap for you. From 7 to 77 years old, Ha Van Hotel, with its marvelous Rooftop bar and very clean rooms bar have someting for you!
reviews.title: The nicest place in the nicest city of Vietnam

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2009, traveled with friends
reviews.text: We paid $25/night for a triple. For that price, the hotel was really clean and in a good location close to the beach. But for me, it was probably a little too touristy since all the shops and restaurants were catered to tourists. The closest pho restaurant was way too expensive. The restaurants we ended up loving the most were across town since the hotel is in the southern most section of the town, but the cab rides weren't too pricey (but more expensive than in Saigon).
reviews.title: Can't beat the price but it's not perfect

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The bathrooms were the Asian bathrooms with no tub (drain in the floor). This was acceptable but by our 2nd and 3rd nights, the bathroom started to smell like sewage and it was very uncomfortable having to use the bathroom. The beds were on the hard side.
reviews.title: Friendly but slack

description: Ha Van Hotel Nha TrangAs Nha Trang’s #1 budget hotel 4 years running, the Canadian managed Ha Van Hotel is your best choice if you are looking for clean/comfortable rooms with excellent services. Our exceptional staffs are honest, friendly and competent (they really are). No cheating, disappearing objects in your room or excessive commission. Our mission is to genuinely care at helping our guests to plan and enjoy their stay in Vietnam. Come, join us and see why we are still the #1 budget hotel in town!
